survived.total: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DASH7047.TITANIC WHERE SURVIVED=1
survived.survived_per_sex: SELECT SEX, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DASH7047.TITANIC WHERE SURVIVED=1 GROUP BY SEX
survived.survived_per_class: SELECT PCLASS, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DASH7047.TITANIC WHERE SURVIVED=1 GROUP BY PCLASS

general.total: SELECT SURVIVED, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DASH7047.TITANIC GROUP BY SURVIVED
